Harvey TanLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 27 Jul 2019I suspect it is for liquidity issues. ETFs listed in the US markets would generally be more liquid due to the higher trade volume. Higher trade volume would generally mean tigher spread which lower your transaction cost.0 comments0
